info.description: This is an API for Imperva Audit Trail
info.title: Audit Trail API

parameters.name: caid
parameters.description: Numeric identifier of the account to operate on. If not specified, operation will be performed on the account identified by the authentication parameters.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of objects to return in the response. Defaults to 50. Maximum is 100

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to start the query from. Default to 0

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The action that was performed in the account, such as ACCOUNT_LOGIN

api_id.description: An API ID created and managed in the Imperva Cloud Security Console and used for authentication
api_id.name: api_id

api_key.description: An API key created and managed in the Imperva Cloud Security Console and used for authentication
api_key.name: api_key

type_key.description: The name of the action that was performed in the account, such as ACCOUNT_LOGIN or SITE_ORIGIN_SERVERS_SETTINGS_CHANGED.

type_description.description: A description of the action that was performed in the account, such as logging in or changing site settings.

user_id.description: ID of the user who performed the action

account_id.description: ID of the account that the action was done in

resource_type_key.description: The type of the resource that the action was done on

resource_id.description: ID of the resource that the action was done on

message.description: Detailed description of the audit event

context_key.description: The audit activity context. Can be one of the following: UI, API, INTERNAL_API, JOB, NA

id.description: Unique id to identify the error in the logs

error_response_wrapper.description: Object that describes a non valid response
